intro.title: Welcome to LashDiary
intro.paragraph1: Experience the artistry of premium lash extensions at our Nairobi studio. Settle into a serene space designed to pamper you while we craft a look that suits your lifestyle.
intro.paragraph2: From classic to mega volume, we offer a full range of lash services tailored to your unique style. Book your appointment today and let's make your lashes absolutely gorgeous!

features.title: Premium Products
features.description: Only the finest quality lash extensions and beauty products. The best for the best!

features.title: Relaxing Studio Experience
features.description: Visit our beautifully appointed studio in Nairobi for a calm, hygienic environment and personalized attention from start to finish.
